Text:
ya fucking maroon ... yer scene list is whacked !!

your scene 1 is the last scene (not including the bts), and,

your scene 2 is first scene.

to recap, the order is:

2, 3, 4, 1, 5

i realize you prolly just processed this thru, from another source, but maybe you could whack that last idiot, further up the line, with this info, so he knows to, like, tie his shoes, 'n shit ...
